content: 4 gusset stitches remain 28 sl1pw wyb-k31 to within 1 st of gap -p2tog-p1-turn 4 gusset stitches remain 29 sl1pw wyf-p32 to within 1 st of gap -p2tog-p1-turn 2 gusset stitches remain 30 sl1pw wyb-k33 to within 1 st of gap -k2tog-k1-do not turn 2 gusset stitches remain slip the last 2 stitches purlwise to the right needle without working them be careful as you carry the working yarn to the instep side it s easy to accidentally make a yarn over there will be 40 stitches on the heel needle resume working in the round continue working in pattern on the instep stitches follow the instructions below for the sole-side stitches start working in pattern on sole-side stitches beginning on line 7 motif repetition 8 continued round instep-side sole-side 5 k3-p1 9 times
